item.title: How do I know I’m getting enough iron?
item.author: lucystreams+beautyblog@gmail.com (Lucy Rebekah)
item.description: I’m researching iron at the moment because I have iron deficiency problems. A lot of the basic information has been gleaned from this somewhat out of date Wikipedia article. Other sources used will be linked as they come up. Here is the lowdown on iron in a Q&A format: How much iron do you have in your body? Healthy people have 4-5 grams of iron in their body The amount is approx.
